body.name: Tempur-Pedic Memory Foam Symphony Pillow Luxury Soft Feel, Standard, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 27 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 hrs 27 mins
features: DUAL-SIDED SOFT BED PILLOW: Features a gently arched side that provides optimal support for back sleepers and a flatter, more traditional side for personalized comfort for stomach and side sleepers
PRESSURE-RELIEVING MEMORY FOAM: Signature TEMPUR material effortlessly adapts to your unique shape for superior head, neck, and shoulder support so you can wake up feeling refreshed
ULTRA-ADAPTIVE MATERIAL: Quickly returns to its shape in the morning and will retain its shape over years of quality sleep, offering superior support at night and alignment after a year
MACHINE-WASHABLE COVER: Low-profile pillow is protected by an ultra-soft and breathable 100% polyester hypoallergenic cover that can be removed and machine washed as needed for easy cleaning
STANDARD SIZE PILLOW: Perfect fit for twin or double beds and offers plenty of room to rest your head comfortably when it's time for bed
body.description: The TEMPUR-Symphony Pillow offers the conforming support only TEMPUR material delivers, combined with comfort in a lightweight, beautiful design. The contoured side provides additional head and neck support for back sleepers, while the other side provides a more traditional pillow feel and works well for side and stomach sleepers. TEMPUR’s legendary material conforms, comforts, and supports your body uniquely and continuously, for a difference you can feel all over..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pillow; I am very happy with it. I like the support it has and the memory foam. It really helped my neck pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little stiff at first!
reviews.reviewText: Needs a bit to break in but once you get past that initial phase it is so nice! Sturdy enough to support you, but not too hard! Great balance of a pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Review for Previous Symphony owners on the fence!
reviews.reviewText: So this review is for those who have previously owned the Symphony, given all the current debate in the reviews.This pillow is NOT like the previous Symphony. I have owned the symphony all the way back to my first in 2009.HOWEVER...it's not all bad. I still like this new version.I definitely like the price of this Amazon order compared to the $99 tempur-pedic store tag (which are currently out of stock and have to be shipped anyways). Even on a BOGO at the tempur-pedic store. The “Very Good Used" I bought beats that price and was in pristine condition when it arrived.The shape is still the iconic Symphony look. The shape is what I have always loved, it's perfect for back and side sleeping. The loft seems ever so slightly lower, but still adequate. If the lower loft bothers you I suggest supplementing the height with a Bamboo Miracle pillow underneath (with most of the shredded foam removed). This works for watching TV in bed or needing the occasional extra height.The foam weight and density are the primary differences. This symphony is noticeably lighter. It just doesn't have that heft the earlier ones did.The nature of this new foam feels different against the head. If you're trying to compare in stores and don't have access to a Symphony, the softness and density of this molded foam compares to the cloud. The old Symphony in my opinion is more like the current Pro Adapt models.All this being said, so far (a week in) I like this new model better. I easily develop neck and sciatic pain with the wrong pillow support. I have always favored soft to the touch pillows but end up missing the support the lack.I loved my original Symphonys. They are the only pillows in my purchases that have made it to the 5 year mark on their warranty. But after the symphony redesign, all the negative reviews caused me to seek other pillows. I tried so many; the Kohl's Big One side sleeper, The Lucid hybrid, Serta, the Sleep Angel, The Miracle Bamboo Pillow etc...etc...They always last about a year (if I'm lucky) and I move on to a new one. I finally got sick of the failure and figured the higher price tag and mixed reviews of tempur-pedic was worth going back to.Bottom-Line - This pillow has a soft feel but it still supports my head and neck. It has the iconic tempur sink and collapse but with a spring'ier response back after lifting up. It doesn't have as firm or dense a feel against the head, so if that was your thing on the previous model...this might not be for you. It really does have a “cloud” effect. It holds you there, but you don't notice a push back. I personally like the new feel..but I was the type that secretly wished the original felt softer.I have noticed using this pillow I am out cold for the night. Others I toss and turn and adjust and never really hit that deep sleep. That makes it a great buy for myself! I will be curious to see how the cloud foam holds up over time. My worry is if it starts soft...and most foam softens over time, I may lose that needed support. Time will tell.*UPDATE - item started causing a lot of neck and shoulder pain. It was returned. On to try the Serta Perfect Curve and the Ikea KLUBBSPORRE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the pillow!
reviews.reviewText: This is so comfortable! Not only do I sleep on it as a pillow at night, but I also lean it against the couch or whatever I’m sitting on because it also makes my back feel great! I suffer from back pain and this really helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars its just so damn hot
reviews.reviewText: i have a much older version of this pillow and even after like 10 years of use its still pretty comfortable . only reason i got a new one is because my old one if starting to fall apart . the quality difference is just so way different that i would say just get one of the cheaper pillows on the market and ignore this. its just so damn hot . oh and is it far from soft. i have resorted to try and use this as a computer chair cushion to see if i can get any use out of it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars dense, soft, perfect pillow for my sidesleeping ways!
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow! I only sleep on my side and it offers my neck and spine the support they need. No more neckaches!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not like the old ones!
reviews.reviewText: I've had one of these for 10 plus years. Decided it was time to replace it. Cheaper material on the new one, doesn't seem like it holds my head as well and I sink right in. Returned and will keep using my old one until i find something to replace it! Make them like u used to!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pillow found
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the hunt for the perfect pillow for years now. when I sleep I feel like I am going def because of too much wax in my ears but with this even though it is smaller then most pillows works great. I can only breath through one nostril at different times through the night and because of the shape of the pillow it doe not matter what side I sleep on because i can breathe through either. I am super happy with this pillow and will buy more.
Definitivamente el mejor material para almohadas
Cannot verify it is authentic, but it comes with original box and packaging. Pillow is comfortable.

It’s the perfect soft to firm ratio that lets your head fall in and get a good night’s rest. I find I am also falling asleep faster rather than taking a long time to fall asleep. My neck pain is also gone!
I tried more than 7 different pillows from amazon and the local store.Finally got this best one.If you’re back sleeper.This is the best choice.Not recommend for side sleepers.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best pillows in the world
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why this product costs so expensive in SG dept stores but it's definitely worth buying. Best pillow in the world hands down. Plus it's super affordable when it's on sale. Medium firm, just what you need for every sleeping position, side or back. No more neck aches. I recommended it to many friends and they loved it too.
